author: macfarla
content:
Q for <@&1416139337179074590> re snooper - we have noticed that logs get very large, especially with getBlobs responses - is there any config settings to turn down the volume? 
request meta data and key data like block hash is generally the useful bit... e.g. understanding the pattern of requests and which block they relate to.
Probably quite rare we need the full block body/blob data
